findings.message:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract DCUCoin (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#135-210) has payable functions:
	 - DCUCoin.fallback() (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#150-152)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
findings.name: locked-ether

findings.message:
Reentrancy in DSAuth.setOwner(address) (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#23-29):
	External calls:
	- auth() (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#25)
		- authority.canCall(src,this,sig) (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#52)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- owner = owner_ (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#27)
	DSAuth.owner (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#16) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- DSAuth.constructor() (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#18-21)
	- DSAuth.isAuthorized(address,bytes4) (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#44-54)
	- DSAuth.owner (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#16)
	- DSAuth.setOwner(address) (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#23-29)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in DSAuth.setAuthority(DSAuthority) (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#31-37):
	External calls:
	- auth() (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#33)
		- authority.canCall(src,this,sig) (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#52)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- authority = authority_ (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#35)
	DSAuth.authority (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#15) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- DSAuth.authority (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#15)
	- DSAuth.isAuthorized(address,bytes4) (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#44-54)
	- DSAuth.setAuthority(DSAuthority) (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#31-37)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
DSAuth.setOwner(address).owner_ (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#23) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = owner_ (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#27)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message: DSMath.mul(uint256,uint256) (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#109-111) is never used and should be removed

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.23 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.23 (0x0c93bd73cbb8b4a4abb8e811d5cb7887133ffa3b.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

setName(string) should be declared external:
